::Composer::

     Composer looked at this new bot.  He saw the weapon.

       "Please, put away your weapon.  I wish for nobody to fall to the
eerie melody of war.  I wish to side with you.  I promise to compose
anything you find satisfactory," Composer said, putting his hands up in the
air.
